name: aws-url-shortener
description: AWS URL Shortener with Lambda and DynamoDB

scripts.test:local: npm run build:local && npm run deploy:local
scripts.install:deps: cd lambdas/createShortUrl && cp package.dev.json package.json && npm install && cd ../redirect && cp package.dev.json package.json && npm install && cd ../getStats && cp package.dev.json package.json && npm install
scripts.install:prod: cd lambdas/createShortUrl && cp package.json package.dev.json && echo '{}' > package.json && cd ../redirect && cp package.json package.dev.json && echo '{}' > package.json && cd ../getStats && cp package.json package.dev.json && echo '{}' > package.json
